name: LearnCounting
0:
”Alexa open learn count and count upto 11”
”Alexa open learn count and count till 122”
”Alexa ask learn count to count till 10”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn count
des:
A fun and interesting skill that will support your kid in their early year to learn to count. 
Ask Alexa to learn counting and count till ___ (say the number, you want Alexa to count till)
This is aimed to help toddlers to learn counting.
And, if you want to set some speed via which Alexa is supposed to count with you, you can say :
"Alexa ask learn count to count till 200 ".
There are 3 speed settings present via which you can use : low, medium , high
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
